inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: hyperemia and fecalith, ≤ 1.1 cm in diameter, compressible or non-compressible, no abscess, no phlegmon

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: hyperemia and fecalith, fat stranding, ≤ 1.1 cm in diameter, no abscess, no phlegmon

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: all female patients consulted a gynaecologist

notes: The patient is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
